# Pull Request

## Description

<!-- Describe your changes -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Content/data update (JSON files in `app/content/data/`)
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Breaking change (may affect existing functionality)

## Pre-Merge Checklist

### Quality Gates (CI enforced)

- [ ] Lint passes
- [ ] Type check passes
- [ ] Build succeeds
- [ ] Smoke tests pass (2 browsers)

### Manual Verification

- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Content/data changes validated (if applicable)

### Review

- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] At least one approval
- [ ] No merge conflicts
